support.question: How can I reset my password?
support.answer: To reset your password, click "Forgot password" on the login page, enter your email address, then follow the link sent to your inbox to choose a new password.

support.question: How do I track my order?
support.answer: Go to "My Orders" in your account dashboard and click on the relevant order to see the current delivery status and tracking link.

support.question: Do you offer customer support on weekends?
support.answer: Yes, we offer limited support on weekends. You can reach us by email between 10:00 and 16:00, and we will respond within 24 hours.

support.question: Can I change or cancel my booking?
support.answer: You can change or cancel your booking within 24 hours of confirmation by going to "My Bookings" and selecting the option "Modify" or "Cancel".

support.question: How long does shipping take?
support.answer: Standard shipping takes 3 to 5 business days once your order is confirmed. Express shipping is available in some regions and takes 1 to 2 business days.

support.question: What payment methods do you accept?
support.answer: We currently accept credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard), PayPal, and in some countries local payment methods such as bank transfer.

support.question: My payment was declined. What should I do?
support.answer: If your payment was declined, first check that your card details are correct and that you have sufficient funds. You can also contact your bank or try another payment method.

support.question: I received a damaged item. How can I report it?
support.answer: If you received a damaged item, please contact support within 7 days of delivery, with your order number and photos of the damage. We will review your case and offer a replacement or refund.

hr.question: How do I apply for annual leave?
hr.answer: Submit your annual leave request through the HR portal under "Time Off Management". Your manager will receive a notification and approve or decline the request.

hr.question: Where can I find my payslips?
hr.answer: Your payslips are available in the HR portal under "My Documents". You can view them online or download them as PDF files.

hr.question: What is the process for remote work approval?
hr.answer: Remote work requests must be submitted to your manager at least 48 hours in advance using the "Remote Work" form. Once approved, HR will update your schedule in the system.

hr.question: Who should I contact if my personal details change?
hr.answer: If your address, phone number, or bank details change, update your profile in the HR portal and, if needed, notify HR by email for confirmation.

hr.question: How can I access the employee benefits information?
hr.answer: You can find all information about health insurance, retirement plans, and other benefits in the HR portal under the "Benefits" section.

hr.question: What should I do on my first day as a new employee?
hr.answer: On your first day, you should check in with your manager, attend the onboarding session if scheduled, and complete the mandatory HR forms in the HR portal.

education.question: How do I access my online courses?
education.answer: You can access your online courses from the learning portal. Log in, then click on the "Courses" tab to see all the modules you are enrolled in.

education.question: Where can I download my course certificates?
education.answer: Once you complete a course, your certificate will be available in your profile under "Achievements". You can view it online or download it as a PDF.

education.question: How do I contact my course instructor?
education.answer: You can contact your instructor from the course page using the "Instructor Contact" or "Messages" section. Some instructors also provide office hours.

education.question: I cannot access a video lesson. What should I do?
education.answer: If you cannot access a video, first try refreshing the page and checking your internet connection. If the problem continues, contact technical support with the course name and lesson title.

education.question: How are my course grades calculated?
education.answer: Course grades are usually calculated based on quizzes, assignments, participation, and final exams. The exact grading policy is described in the course syllabus.

education.question: Can I retake a quiz or assignment?
education.answer: Retake options depend on the course policy. Some quizzes allow multiple attempts, while others do not. Check the instructions for each activity or ask your instructor.
